home s=
o I can get a junit report and I can't get it to run. I am

lowing message:

Unable to locate tools.jar. Expected to find it in C:\Prog=
ram 
Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\lib\tools.jar

 drive. I have JAVA_HOME pointing to

variable. I don't know why it is looking down =
in C:\Program Files\Java

ory.
